description:
Tatewaki Kuno is captain of the school Kendo club and is also in love with Akane Tendo. He challenges Ranma to a duel after learning about Akane’s status as Ranma’s fiancée.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Sudden Storm of Love... Hey, Wait a Minute!
Coup de foudre ou coup de guerre
Ikinari Ai no Arashi: Chotto Matte yo
いきなり愛の嵐 ちょっと待ってョ
